Context:
The college is committed to providing faculty with access to training and support for using Brightspace. Students seeking Brightspace assistance can use the Help Desk Live Chat. Other options for students include learning about land acknowledgement, signing up for updates on application deadlines, college news, events, tours, and more by providing an email address, calling 416-415-2000 or TTY: 1-877-515-5559, or visiting the social media hub. The information in the website is subject to change without notice and should not be considered as a representation, offer, or warranty. Students are responsible for verifying George Brown College fee requirements.

Contact Information:
Help Desk Live Chat
Phone number: 416-415-2000, TTY: 1-877-515-5559
Email address: ask.george@georgebrown.ca
Social Media Hub: [Visit the Social Media Hub]()

Note: The program or courses offered by the college are not mentioned in the text, so an empty text would be the appropriate response in this case.
